Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for x86-64 Containers) 2024.1 (Build 262U)

Method.name: InitializeHttpRequestObject
Method.Implementation: Set ..HttpRequest = ##class(%Net.HttpRequest).%New() Do ##class(%Net.URLParser).Decompose(..Server, .components) Set:$Data(components("host"), host) ..HttpRequest.Server = host Set:$Data(components("port"), port) ..HttpRequest.Port = port Set:$$$LOWER($Get(components("scheme")))="https" ..HttpRequest.Https = $$$YES, ..HttpRequest.SSLConfiguration = ..SSLConfiguration Merge:$Data(components) ..URLComponents = components Quit $$$OK

Property.name: appid
Property.Description: The ID of the application making the call

Property.name: calls
Property.Description: A conceptual webservice call to VistA using this API

Property.name: packageid
Property.Description: The VistA package ID associated with the calls being made

Property.name: siteids
Property.Description: An ordered array of VistA site ids. The calls will be made asynchronously to all the VistA sites.

Property.name: istransactional
Property.Description: Whether or not this is a transactional call

Property.name: operations
Property.Description: The CRUD operation associated with the Record.

Property.name: istransactional
Property.Description: Whether or not the call made was transactional

Property.name: maxrecorddepth
Property.Description: If the call made was a READ, the value max_record_depth was set to.

Property.name: maxrecordsreturned
Property.Description: If the call made was a READ, the value max_records_returned was set to.

Property.name: operation
Property.Description: The operation of the call made

Property.name: callinfo
Property.Description: Information about a call that was made

Property.name: httpresponse
Property.Description: The HTTP Response associated with a call response

Property.name: records
Property.Description: Represents a record in VistA. Synonymous with a table row in a database.

Property.name: id
Property.Description: The identifying number of the field

Property.name: name
Property.Description: The name of the field.

Property.name: value
Property.Description: The value of the field

Property.name: valuetype
Property.Description: The type associated with the field value

Property.name: fields
Property.Description: A field on a File. The name or id number is required.

Property.name: id
Property.Description: The file identifier.. dot delimited numbers

Property.name: httpstatuscode
Property.Description: The HTTP status code associated with the call response

Property.name: message
Property.Description: The description/message associated with an http response

Property.name: maxrecorddepth
Property.Description: For READ operations, the max Record Object depth. Defaults to 2. Ignored for operations other than READ.

Property.name: maxrecordsreturned
Property.Description: For READ operations, the max number of records returned. Defaults to 50. Ignored for operations other than READ.

Property.name: operation
Property.Description: The CRUD operation

Property.name: record
Property.Description: Represents a record in VistA. Synonymous with a table row in a database.

Property.name: file
Property.Description: a VistA File. Analogous with a database table.

Property.name: ien
Property.Description: Internal Entry Number.. analogous to a primary key id in a database.

Property.name: appid
Property.Description: The ID of the application making the call

Property.name: calls
Property.Description: A conceptual webservice call to VistA using this API

Property.name: packageid
Property.Description: The VistA package ID associated with the calls being made

Property.name: siteid
Property.Description: The id of the VistA site

Property.name: callresponses
Property.Description: The response from a call. A transactional call will have a single call response. A non-transactional call will have each operation treated as a separate call.

Property.name: istransactional
Property.Description: Whether or not the call made was transactional

Property.name: maxrecorddepth
Property.Description: If the call made was a READ, the value max_record_depth was set to.

Property.name: maxrecordsreturned
Property.Description: If the call made was a READ, the value max_records_returned was set to.

Property.name: operation
Property.Description: The operation of the call made

Property.Description: Information about a call that was made

Property.name: httpresponse
Property.Description: The HTTP Response associated with a call response

Property.Description: The HTTP status code associated with the call response

Property.Description: The ID of the application making the call

Property.Description: An ordered array of VistA site ids. The calls will be made asynchronously to all the VistA sites.

Property.Description: The response from a call. A transactional call will have a single call response. A non-transactional call will have each operation treated as a separate call.

XData.name: OpenAPI

Property.name: appid
Property.Description: The ID of the application making the call

Property.name: calls
Property.Description: A conceptual webservice call to VistA using this API

Property.name: packageid
Property.Description: The VistA package ID associated with the calls being made

Property.name: siteid
Property.Description: The id of the VistA site

Property.name: istransactional
Property.Description: Whether or not this is a transactional call

Property.name: operations
Property.Description: The CRUD operation associated with the Record.

Property.name: maxrecorddepth
Property.Description: For READ operations, the max Record Object depth. Defaults to 2. Ignored for operations other than READ.

Property.name: maxrecordsreturned
Property.Description: For READ operations, the max number of records returned. Defaults to 50. Ignored for operations other than READ.

Property.name: operation
Property.Description: The CRUD operation

Property.name: record
Property.Description: Represents a record in VistA. Synonymous with a table row in a database.

Property.name: file
Property.Description: a VistA File. Analogous with a database table.

Property.name: ien
Property.Description: Internal Entry Number.. analogous to a primary key id in a database.

Property.name: fields
Property.Description: A field on a File. The name or id number is required.

Property.name: id
Property.Description: The file identifier.. dot delimited numbers

Property.name: id
Property.Description: The identifying number of the field

Property.name: name
Property.Description: The name of the field.

Property.name: value
Property.Description: The value of the field

Property.name: valuetype
Property.Description: The type associated with the field value

Property.name: asynchronousvistabody
Property.Description: Use this property for body content with content-type = application/json.

Method.name: LoadHttpRequestObject
Method.Implementation: Set sc = $$$OK Set httpRequest.ContentType = ..%ContentType Do httpRequest.SetHeader("accept", ..%Consume) Do httpRequest.SetHeader("sec_id", ..headersecid) If $Piece($$$LOWER(..%ContentType),";",1) = "application/json" Return ..asynchronousvistabody.%JSONExportToStream(httpRequest.EntityBody) Quit sc

Property.name: synchronousvistabody
Property.Description: Use this property for body content with content-type = application/json.

Method.name: LoadHttpRequestObject
Method.Implementation: Set sc = $$$OK Set httpRequest.ContentType = ..%ContentType Do httpRequest.SetHeader("accept", ..%Consume) Do httpRequest.SetHeader("sec_id", ..headersecid) If $Piece($$$LOWER(..%ContentType),";",1) = "application/json" Return ..synchronousvistabody.%JSONExportToStream(httpRequest.EntityBody) Quit sc

Property.name: status
Property.Description: Status for parts of the response handling like JSON Parsing. /// This allows for returning the response body that will not be returned if the request fails.

Method.name: LoadFromResponse
Method.Implementation: Set sc = $$$OK Do ..body.CopyFrom(httpResponse.Data) Set ..httpStatusCode = httpResponse.StatusCode Set ..operation = caller Set key = "" For { Set key = $Order(httpResponse.Headers(key), 1, headerValue) Quit:key="" Do ..headers.SetAt(headerValue, key) } Quit sc

Method.name: LoadFromResponse
Method.Implementation: Set sc = $$$OK Do ##super(httpResponse, caller) Return sc

Property.name: inlineresponse200
Property.Description: http status code = 200 content-type = application/json /// Success

Method.name: LoadFromResponse
Method.Implementation: Set sc = $$$OK Do ##super(httpResponse, caller) If $$$LOWER($Piece(httpResponse.ContentType,";",1))="application/json",httpResponse.StatusCode = "200" { Set ..inlineresponse200 = ##class(vgclient.model.inlineresponse200).%New() Set ..status = ..inlineresponse200.%JSONImport(httpResponse.Data) Return sc } Return sc
